scripts.build-ol: rm -rf node_modules/ol/build && mkdir -p node_modules/ol/build && cp -rf node_modules/ol/src/ol node_modules/ol/build && node node_modules/ol/tasks/serialize-workers.cjs
scripts.build-ol-mapbox-style: rm -rf node_modules/ol-mapbox-style/build && mkdir -p node_modules/ol-mapbox-style/build && cp -rf node_modules/ol-mapbox-style/dist/*.js node_modules/ol-mapbox-style/build && sed -i "s#from 'ol#from 'ol/build/ol#g" node_modules/ol-mapbox-style/build/*.js
scripts.start: npm run build-ol && npm run build-ol-mapbox-style && parcel src/index.html
